      Parameters:
      newSubjectDto - the new subject information
      Returns:
      the updated subject

    • discontinueSubject

      public SubjectDTO discontinueSubject(SubjectDTO subjectDto)
      Discontinue the given subject.

      A discontinued subject is not deleted from the database, but will be prevented from logging into the system, sending data, or otherwise interacting with the system.

      Parameters:
      subjectDto - the subject to discontinue
      Returns:
      the discontinued subject

    • assignOrUpdateSource

      @Transactional public MinimalSourceDetailsDTO assignOrUpdateSource(Subject subject, SourceType sourceType, Project project, MinimalSourceDetailsDTO sourceRegistrationDto)
      Creates or updates a source for a subject. It creates and assigns a source of a for a dynamicallyRegister-able sourceType. Currently, it is allowed to create only once source of a dynamicallyRegistrable sourceType per subject. Otherwise finds the matching source and updates meta-data.

    • getSources

      public List<MinimalSourceDetailsDTO> getSources(Subject subject)
      Gets all sources assigned to the subject identified by :login.
      Returns:
      list of sources

    • deleteSubject

      public void deleteSubject(String login)
      Delete the subject with the given login from the database.
      Parameters:
      login - the login

    • findSubjectSourcesFromRevisions

      public List<MinimalSourceDetailsDTO> findSubjectSourcesFromRevisions(Subject subject)
      Finds all sources of subject including inactive sources.
      Parameters:
      subject - of whom the sources should be retrieved.
      Returns:
      list of MinimalSourceDetailsDTO of sources.

    • findRevision

      public SubjectDTO findRevision(String login, Integer revision) throws NotFoundException, org.radarbase.management.security.NotAuthorizedException
      Get a specific revision for a given subject.
      Parameters:
      login - the login of the subject
      revision - the revision number
      Returns:
      the subject at the given revision
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if there was no subject with the given login at the given revision number
      org.radarbase.management.security.NotAuthorizedException

    • getLatestRevision

      public SubjectDTO getLatestRevision(String login) throws NotFoundException
      Get latest known revision of a subject with the given login.
      Parameters:
      login - the login of the subject
      Returns:
      the latest revision for that subject
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if no subject was found with the given login

      Returns:

    • findAll

      Returns:
      page of subjects matching filter.

    • getPrivacyPolicyUrl

      protected URL getPrivacyPolicyUrl(Subject subject)
      Gets relevant privacy-policy-url for this subject.

      If the active project of the subject has a valid privacy-policy-url returns that url. Otherwise, it loads the default URL from ManagementPortal configurations that is general.

      Parameters:
      subject - to get relevant policy url
      Returns:
      URL of privacy policy for this token
